price: 115. Auparavant, Nous avions fait une recommandation à Adam mais il l’oublia et Nous ne trouvâmes pas chez lui de ferme résolution.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿahid'nā ilā ādama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu ʿazman
